#summary Screenshots of the HUD with cropping to prevent excessive bandwidth and page space usage.

=Introduction=
Click for full-screen. Magenta text is generally indicator for last-damage-dealt. Non-cropped version can be found [http://code.google.com/p/gmang-tf2hud/wiki/ScreenshotsFull here].

==Menus==
First is main menu, second is team menu, third is class menu. Models are animated and hotkeys work.

==Scout==
The health and ammo appears that way for all classes. Bonk Energy Drink and Crit-A-Cola have color zones to indicate when the item's effect will wear off. Green = effect active, red = effect expired.

[http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/4091/hudscreenscoutfull.png http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/900/hudscreenscoutthumb.png]

==Soldier==
When overhealed, health turns light blue-cyan.

[http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6519/hudscreensoldierfull.png http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/3424/hudscreensoldierthumb.png]

==Pyro==
When below half, health turns dull yellow. Also shows payload race.

[http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/750/hudscreenpyrofull.png http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/2170/hudscreenpyrothumb.png]

==Demoman==
Top is regular loadout, bottom is sword+shield loadout. Chargin' Targe charge meter notches indicate crit status: past orange notches is minicrit, past red notches is crit. Yellow text is decapitated heads.

[http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/8513/hudscreenstickyfull.png http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/7828/hudscreenstickythumb.png]

[http://img532.imageshack.us/img532/6641/hudscreentargefull.png http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/1420/hudscreentargethumb.png]

Shows CTF carried layout.

Top is uncharged Uber. Bottom is activated Uber. Also shows targetID's.

===Sniper=
Huntsman chargeup has indicator notches for headshot damage values. Orange zone = 175+ damage on headshot, green = 200+, purple = 260+, grey = 300+.

[http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/3175/hudscreensniperfull.png http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/7757/hudscreensniperthumb.png]

==Spy==
Above is donning a disguise, below is disguise donned. Cloak meter is ItemEffectMeter, which means it's shared with things like Sandman, Jarate, and Buff Banner charge.

[http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/965/hudscreenspyfull.png http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/8197/hudscreenspythumb.png]

[http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/2540/hudscreendisguisefull.png http://img375.imageshack.us/img375/6279/hudscreendisguisethumb.png]
